name: Furniture Spraying and Refinishing
description: Revitalize your furniture with our expert spraying service - the affordable way to transform your home and office pieces.
introduction: Breathe new life into your furniture without the expense of replacement. Our professional furniture spraying service offers a cost-effective solution to rejuvenate your home and office pieces. Using high-quality paints and finishes, we transform tired, worn furniture into stunning focal points that look brand new.

benefits.title: Affordable Furniture Makeover
benefits.description: Achieve a stunning transformation of your furniture at a fraction of the cost of buying new pieces.

benefits.title: Enhance Your Living and Working Spaces
benefits.description: Professionally refinished furniture can significantly improve the look and feel of any room in your home or office.

benefits.title: Durable, Long-Lasting Finish
benefits.description: Our specialized spraying techniques provide a smooth, durable finish that withstands daily use and looks great for years to come.

whyChooseUs.title: Local Experts in Furniture Refinishing
whyChooseUs.description: Our team of skilled professionals has years of experience in furniture spraying and refinishing, serving UK homeowners and businesses with pride.

whyChooseUs.title: Premium, Eco-Friendly Materials
whyChooseUs.description: We use top-quality, low-VOC paints and finishes that are both environmentally friendly and built to last.

whyChooseUs.title: Convenient On-Site or Workshop Service
whyChooseUs.description: We offer both on-site spraying for larger pieces and a workshop service for smaller items, ensuring minimal disruption to your daily life.

whyChooseUs.title: 100% Satisfaction Guarantee
whyChooseUs.description: We stand behind our work with a comprehensive warranty and a commitment to your complete satisfaction.

process: Step 1: Thorough cleaning and preparation of all surfaces to ensure optimal paint adhesion.
Step 2: Application of high-quality paint or finish using state-of-the-art spraying equipment for a flawless result.
Step 3: Meticulous inspection and touch-ups to guarantee a perfect finish that meets our rigorous quality standards.

materialsAndFinishes.title: Premium Furniture Paints
materialsAndFinishes.description: We offer a wide range of high-quality paints, including specialized coatings for wood, metal, and plastic furniture.

materialsAndFinishes.title: Custom Colour Matching
materialsAndFinishes.description: Our colour matching service ensures your refinished furniture perfectly complements your existing decor.

materialsAndFinishes.title: Durable Clear Coats
materialsAndFinishes.description: We apply tough clear coats to protect your furniture's new finish, ensuring longevity and easy maintenance.

beforeAfterGallery.description: Stunning transformation of a dated oak dining set: From tired and worn to sleek and modern.
Complete makeover of metal office furniture: Restored to a professional, contemporary finish.

faq.question: How long does your furniture spraying process take?
faq.answer: The process typically takes 3-5 days, depending on the size and complexity of the furniture. We work efficiently to minimize disruption while ensuring a high-quality finish.

faq.question: Can you match my desired colour scheme?
faq.answer: Absolutely! Our colour matching expertise allows us to recreate any shade you desire or match existing elements in your space for a cohesive look.

faq.question: What kind of warranty do you offer on your furniture refinishing services?
faq.answer: We stand behind our work with a comprehensive 2-year warranty on all our furniture spraying and refinishing services, giving you peace of mind in your investment.

faq.question: How should I prepare my furniture for the refinishing project?
faq.answer: For on-site services, simply clear the area around the furniture. For workshop services, we'll provide guidance on how to safely prepare your items for transport. Our team handles all the necessary cleaning and preparation of the pieces.

elementsWeSpray.description: Transform your dining set with our expert spraying service, achieving a smooth, durable finish that looks brand new and withstands daily use.
Our innovative refinishing techniques can update wooden wardrobes, dressers, and bed frames, giving your bedroom a fresh, stylish look.
Revitalize your office furniture with our specialized painting service, making old desks and filing cabinets look professional and modern.
We meticulously refinish kitchen cabinets and islands to create a cohesive, beautifully finished kitchen space.

professionalBenefits.description: Our professional colour experts will help you choose the perfect palette to achieve your dream look, whether you're updating a single piece or an entire room.
Our advanced spraying techniques and equipment ensure a smooth, even finish free of brush strokes or imperfections, rivaling the look of brand-new furniture.
From initial consultation to final inspection, we handle every aspect of your furniture transformation, ensuring a stress-free experience and stunning results.

maintenanceAndCare.description: To preserve your newly refinished furniture, we recommend regular dusting and cleaning with gentle, non-abrasive products. Avoid placing hot or wet items directly on the surface. With proper care, your furniture's new finish will maintain its beauty and durability for many years to come.
maintenanceAndCare.longevity: Our professional-grade finishes are designed to last. With proper maintenance, you can expect your refinished furniture to look great for 5-7 years or more, depending on use and care.

customerTestimonials.quote: The work was fast and efficient. All aspects of the job were catered for and completed with professionalism
customerTestimonials.author: Mr Mark Scott, Bromley

customerTestimonials.quote: We would have no hesitation in highly recommending Coutts Building . We would also be happy for anyone to come and look at the work they have done for us.
customerTestimonials.author: J Lane, Croydon

pricingInfo: For our professional furniture spraying and refinishing services, please request a quote. While prices may vary based on the size, complexity, and number of pieces, we pride ourselves on offering premium results at a fraction of the cost of buying new furniture. We also offer flexible payment options to make your furniture makeover more accessible.

environmentalCommitment.ecoFriendlyOptions: We're committed to environmental responsibility, offering a selection of low-VOC and eco-friendly paint options that are safe for your home and the planet.
environmentalCommitment.wasteReduction: Our refinishing process significantly reduces landfill waste compared to replacing furniture. We also practice strict waste reduction, recycling unused materials and properly disposing of any hazardous substances.

locations.introduction: Transform your Bromley home or office with our expert furniture spraying services. Our skilled team brings years of experience and cutting-edge techniques to breathe new life into your furniture. Whether you're looking to update a single piece or refinish an entire set, our professional spraying solutions offer a cost-effective and stunning alternative to buying new.
